page.title: 16THE WHITEHAVEN NEWS.
page.content: The Whitehaven News is read by about 70,000 people every week.The public buy it because of the good balance between features and news.The paper started 133 years ago.It covers an area of West Cumbria from Seascale to Distington.The paper draws the attention of the public to cases of abuse and injustice.The reporters also cover items of local interest such as carnivals, employment,sport etc.Local secretaries send in reports about such things as hound-trailing,darts matches etc.Nowadays the printing is set up by computer.The paper is financed through advertising,ranging from property sales to lost&found.It relies mostly on adverts from local garages and Estate Agents.The Editor decides what is published and tries to give an impartial viewpoint.
